hero.title: Мы - эксперты из /n крупных компаний /n *(BigTech).*
body: В рамках программы менторства мы можем помочь стартапам разобраться со сложными юридическими вопросами, помочь найти экономичное и эффективное решение юридического вопроса.

howItWorks.title: Менторские сессии: как это работает

body.title: Запрос
body.body: Перед звонком с ментором-юристом вы формулируете запрос, связанный с юридической тематикой и бизнес-деятельностью стартапа.

body.title: Анализ
body.body: Организаторы, при необходимости, связываются с автором запроса уточнить детали запроса, цель и желаемый результат.

body.title: Обратная связь
body.body: Мы будем рады, если вы поделитесь с нами позже, смогли ли мы решить ваш вопрос, а также если поделитесь рекомендацией с другими стартапами.

howItWorks.disclaimer: Мы не можем помочь с техническими вопросами такими как подготовка документов, регистрация юридического лица, представление в судебных или иных органах и другие. В случае сомнений, свяжитесь с организаторами, чтобы уточнить релевантность вопроса. Менторские сессии организуются на безвозмездной основе.

items.title: Love for technology
items.body: We understand that Tech sphere is a rapidly developing and requires a creative approach and flexible thinking, and that’s why we love it!

items.title: Honesty
items.body: We respect honesty, so we will always tell you if we can't help with a problem. We also appreciate your feedback.

items.title: Respectful attitude towards work
items.body: We appreciate the work and effort put in by both founders and managers of startups, as well as legal mentors.

items.title: Love for the work we do
items.body: We care about what we do.

items.title: Respect for the founders
items.body: We know that being a startup founder is not easy, so we want to help you find the strategically correct direction and minimize legal and financial risks.

mentors.title: Our mentors
mentors.body: Meet our mentors. Our mentors are industry leaders, successful entrepreneurs, and professionals who are passionate about sharing their knowledge and helping you succeed. They provide personalized advice, support, and inspiration, ensuring you have the tools and confidence to navigate your path.

mentors.name: Tatiana Murzabaeva
mentors.position: Head of Business Operations and Regulatory Affairs Legal Team
mentors.expertise: E-commerce | Business Operations | Compliance | Consumer Protection
experience: Tatiana leads the business operations and regulatory affairs legal team at Joom, ensuring compliance across all operational countries (with a primary focus on the EU and CIS regions). She provides comprehensive legal support for the marketplace, facilitates the launch of new business units, and champions the platform’s participation in initiatives like the EU Product Safety and Consumer Protection Pledges.

Tatiana’s expertise includes e-commerce regulations, product safety, consumer protection compliance, and cross-border and domestic litigation. Her previous roles encompass managing legal support for international logistics IT solutions at Joom Logistics, overseeing legal matters for Eastern European operations at retailer Kingfisher, and serving as a dispute resolution associate at international legal firm Baker McKenzie.

Tatiana excels in translating complex regulatory matters into actionable insights for business leaders, ensuring smooth and fast business growth while maintaining compliance and operational integrity.
mentors.education: National Research University — Higher School of Economics

mentors.name: Kamil Egelev
mentors.position: Privacy Compliance Leader and Qualified Lawyer
mentors.expertise: Privacy Law | Data Protection | IT law | Data Privacy | Privacy Compliance | Privacy Due Diligence
experience: Kamil is a seasoned privacy compliance leader (IAPP CIPM, CIPP/E) and qualified lawyer.

He has over 14 years of experience in the legal profession, both in law firms and as in-house counsel for a tech giant. Worked with fintech, e-commerce, advertising, ride-hailing, food-tech, transportation, ed tech, e-health businesses, consulting on IT/IP, privacy and data protection issues in multiple countries (EU, US, CIS). Supported companies during on-site audits of data protection authorities for good outcome. Excelled in simplifying privacy compliance.

mentors.name: Mariet Mezokh
mentors.position: IP and Digital Products Legal Support Specialist
mentors.expertise: IP Law | Commercial law | Acceleration programs | FinTech | Digital products development
experience: Mariet is an expert specialising in IP and legal support of digital products.

Her main projects include MTS StartUp Hub acceleration and partnerships program (2020-2024), UGC-platform NUUM (2023-2024) applications store (2022-2024).  Mariet has also acted as IP practice independent advisor at Infralex and as operations manager of a UK funded NGO.
Her experience combines support of digital products for Retail companies (IKEA, Magnit) and Telecom industry (MTS).
mentors.education: Magister Juris, University of Oxford; Jurisprudence, Kuban State University.

mentors.name: Lina Gevorgyan
mentors.position: Head of Legal Services in Content and Media Protection
mentors.expertise: IP | Copyright | User & Content Safety | Dispute Resolution
experience: Lina is an expert specialising in content and media services.

She is skilled in content protection, user safety, IP and dispute resolution. She worked for Yandex, TikTok, UGC-platform NUUM. Lina has also established legal department for WebKontrol Ltd. from the ground up and implemented there functional and management processes.
Her experience combines proactive risk assessment and mitigation with extensive court practice.
mentors.education: Geneva University, Moscow State Law Academy (MSAL).

mentors.name: Aleksandra Skiba
mentors.position: Head of Legal Services in Content and Media Protection
mentors.expertise: Legal operations | Legal management | Contract management | Legal tech
experience: Aleksandra Skiba is a partner at playbooq.com, specializing in legal process outsourcing, operations, and digital transformation for startups.
With over 10 years of experience, she focuses on  building and enhancing back-office processes.
Previously, she held positions at inDrive, Vivid Money, OZON.ru, and others.
mentors.education: Queen Mary University of London, Higher School of Economics

goal.placeholder: Describe your challenges and the results you expect
